reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: We already have two of these in our home, and those work flawlessly. This one however does not seem to work. Unlike our others, this one is not backlit, and remains dark in a room. The wiring instructions are pretty straightforward, but it will not operate, behaving as though it's completely dead. This is regardless of whether the switch is depressed or where the slide is located. I'll take a closer look at it as we wrap up the project, but it will more than likely be returned for a refund. It's an unusual strike out for Leviton, which we've trusted for years.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2022
reviews.title: Not Great...

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Initial major flicker/flash when turning on and some flicker when on, especially on low. Also, only dims about 50% of the light.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2021
reviews.title: Flicker with LEDs

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Always been a big Leviton fan, so this seemed like a no brainer. But I was so disappointed when I opened them up. Feels like cheap brittle plastic. Buttons don't feel secure. Not at all what I expected from Leviton.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2021
reviews.title: Very cheap feeling

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Because of the three different colors of switch and on-off buttons offered in the box it makes the whole unit a little flimsey. In that you can choose what color you want to use but giving you that choice means you throw away two parts. Making the on-off switch and dimmer parts removable/interchangeable they have taken the solid plastic parts and made them flimsey. Once installed and screwed down they seem more solid. But if I was aware of the way this is made I would have chosen a different switch. As I wanted just white.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
reviews.title: good dimmer but

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Getting 2 into a double gang box is challenging and the programming instructions are not intuitive, but we got there in the end. Note they come with white, almond and beige fronts in one pkg.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
reviews.title: Hard to program

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: This matched the decor and design of all my other switches and dimmers. The LED chandelier bulbs did flicker (no built in driver) at a high setting but I was able to use the new dimmers program to eliminate that issue when full “On”. I would only recommend using this dimmer to replace the Illumatech incandescent model (Leviton IPI06) so that the wall switches all look the same. That’s why I bought mine.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
reviews.title: This dimmer has the same face as the Illumatech IPI06.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Not all led bulbs work with certain dimmers. Love TCP leds. 75% of my lighting is LED. TCP specifically tells you by model number which dimmer is compatible. This one was recommended and works beautifuly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.title: Compatible with certain TCP led lights.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: Works as expected. Complaints by others that the button feels a bit cheap are true, but it is just lose so that the button plate can be interchangeable with the other supplied colors. You need to READ THE INSTRUCTIONS (yes I know I never do that either). Under the switch face plate is small switch to change from INC to LED bulbs, you can calibrate the slider to better span the whole dimmer brightness range, and there are little side wings that need to be removed with a pliers before you can install them side by side in a multi-gang box. Other than that easy enough to install, although I had to straighten the wire (which was on a screw terminal on the previous switch) and clip it to put it in the pigtail connecter clip ... took me a few minutes to ponder that, as most plugs with pigtail clips also have side screws. Not rocket science and, again, if I had read the instructions first ;-).
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
reviews.title: Works well enough that I ordered a second one.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: I can't make enough critical comments about these Leviton products. They were put into a new house by the contractor and, one after another have failed. To make it worse, Leviton keeps changing the wire color coding making replacements a real pain. In addition there are numerous design miscues eg. the mounting plate wing brakeaways don't brake away. Do yourself a favor and stay away from this manufacturer's products.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020
reviews.title: Badly Engineered Product

reviews.text: The switch works fine, and the interchangeable face covers are easy to swap. my only Issue was the back part of the switch , (the part that would go into the junction box) takes up so much room, it is hard to get into the J box. if you have a ton of wires to tuck in forget it. larger volume box may be required to fit this in.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: I used this to dim nine 60 Watt equivalent dimmable LED's in a chandelier, dimmer performs as stated. I can dim the LED's until they go out, with no flicker. You can turn the lights on or off from a single push button while keeping the same brightness level. Threshold brightness (lowest preferred) can be set directly on the dimmer and simple to adjust.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019
reviews.title: Works perfectly

reviews.text: The only problem I have is that the on/off button hangs-up after pushing it. The changeable color plates are a great idea.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2019
reviews.title: The on/off button hangs-up, you need to wiggle it to pop out.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: I only allow licensed electricians to do anything electrical in my home. I purchased 3 LED fixtures to replace 1998 vintage fixtures using incandescent bulbs. I had no dimmer switches in my home. This model switch was on a list of recommended models from the fixture manufacturer. My electrician had these installed in no time. I ordered the appropriate "snap on" plates to avoid having screws. It's a nice look.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2019
reviews.title: Easy For A Professional

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: We had another product installed and it failed, whereas this switch worked great and is easy to operate for my mother. large on/off switch and dimmer was large for her ailing rheumatoid arthritis in her fingers. The multiple colors also helped with what style we wanted to install. The LEDs did not flicker like previous light switches we tried in the past.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2018
reviews.title: Worked perfectly and exactly as described

reviews.productTitle: Leviton IllumaTech Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, IPL06-10Z, White with Ivory and Light Almond Faceplates
reviews.text: This product works!!! There is no buzzing sounds from the switch, and the lights do not flicker when they are dimmed. Please remember to use dimmable bulbs that are LEDs or CFLs. I have purchased other dimmers that did not work. This dimmer also works with regular Incandesent bulbs. When the lights are dim they go down about 80%. There is also a switch at the bottom of this switch to turn the light on and off. Art
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2018
reviews.title: This dimmer works and works well !
